body.p: Simal is made possible as a result of contributions from a large number of people and organisations. This page identifies some of the most important contributors (in alphabetic order), we thank them all.

tr.td: The generation of static representations of Simal catalogues are created using Apache Forrest, an XML publishing framework.
We use a number of Eclipse projects, but by far the most important is the Rich Ajax Platform (RAP)

The initial use cases for Simal were provided by OSS Watch. As a result the initial resources for creating Simal came from there. OSS Watch is a JISC funded project within Oxford University Computing Services.
Icons used in Simal are provided by Mark James of FamFamFam.
